txt_en: Childhood is truly a time of wonder.
txt_cn: 童年处处是美好。

txt_en: Life is short. Go where you feel love.
txt_cn: 人生苦短，就大胆去爱。

txt_en: Everyone deserves happiness.
txt_cn: 每一个人都值得幸福。

txt_en: Love is a many-splendored thing.
txt_cn: 爱，万般精彩。

txt_en: The only thing that matters is what you choose to be now.
txt_cn: 你当下所做的选择才最为重要。

txt_en: It's easy to quit, but don't. Don't quit. Don't stop.
txt_cn: 永不轻言放弃，永不停止脚步。

txt_en: You should be very proud of what you've done with it.
txt_cn: 你应该为自己的努力而感到骄傲。

txt_en: It's time for you to start living your life.
txt_cn: 是时候开始为你自己而活。

txt_en: When we let go of something, it opens up a little space to grow.
txt_cn: 学会放手的同时也学会成长。

txt_en: If our world's gonna survive, what matters is what we do now.
txt_cn: 世界的存亡与人类的行动息息相关。

txt_en: Every day is a chance to be better.
txt_cn: 日日皆有新成长。

txt_en: You have to get lost before you find yourself.
txt_cn: 发现自我的路上必然会经历迷惘。

txt_en: Don't settle for average. Bring the best to your moment.
txt_cn: 不要甘于平庸，竭力活出当下精彩。

txt_en: The center of bringing any dream into fruition is self-discipline.
txt_cn: 实现梦想的关键是懂得自律。

txt_en: Everything in life happens according to our time, our clock.
txt_cn: 万事皆有自己的节奏。

txt_en: The only failure there is is the failure to try.
txt_cn: 勇于尝试，便不叫失败。

txt_en: Take a leap. Take a chance.
txt_cn: 人生要敢于尝试。

txt_en: The future is yours. Have fun with it.
txt_cn: 尽情享受属于你的未来。

txt_en: A father's love is something to cherish and respect.
txt_cn: 父爱永远值得珍惜和尊敬。

txt_en: Don't let anyone rush you with their timelines.
txt_cn: 不要让他人打断你的生活节奏。

txt_en: Summer is the time of plenty.
txt_cn: 夏日时光，丰富多彩。

txt_en: Love has no boundaries!
txt_cn: 爱无止境！

txt_en: If you want it, you gotta go get it.
txt_cn: 想要什么，就去尽力争取。

txt_en: We're defined by our actions, not our words.
txt_cn: 个人的价值在于你做了什么，而非你说了什么。

txt_en: The greatest pleasure of life is love.
txt_cn: 正是爱，承载着人生极致的美好。
